name: Prototype 1
description:
Prototype 1

This is the first prototype in a line of weekly prototypes I'm challenging myself to do. I'm spending one week per prototype concept, releasing it, and doing a mini postmortem on them. 

This prototype was inspired by Super Mario Odyssey's hat throwing mechanic. I thought it looked incredibly fun to throw an object, be able to hold it in position, and then bounce off of it, so I experimented with it.

This is the result of one week of work and is a buggy prototype, so bear that in mind!

Read the post mortem on my Medium blog: 

https://medium.com/@tylerehadd...

Controls:

Arrow Keys to move

Spacebar to jump

Press A to throw object

Hold A after throwing to hold object in place

by Tyler Haddad
